definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "pin"), an ancient Korean writing system
(fig.) to have a meeting with state security agents (to be warned to behave "responsibly")
Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves

sentences.english: After making his tea, I asked if it would be all right if I visited him again .
sentences.chinese: 给他泡好茶之后，我问他以后是否可以再来拜访。

sentences.english: First of all, one should use Indian or Ceylonese tea.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你得用印度或者斯里兰卡茶。

sentences.english: Drinking tea with honey is good for our health.
We also use instant tea and coffee.
sentences.chinese: 他们也喜欢喝马上冲马上喝的茶和咖啡。

sentences.english: You have bees to thank every time you drizzle some honey into your tea.
sentences.chinese: 每次在茶中滴入蜂蜜时你都要感谢蜜蜂的馈赠。

sentences.english: Mrs. Dursley sipped her tea through pursed lips.
sentences.chinese: 德思礼太太嘬起嘴唇呷了一口茶。

sentences.english: Earlier today, he even made her a cup of tea, which still appears to be a novelty for all involved.
sentences.chinese: 今早他甚至为妈妈冲了一杯茶，这实在是前所未有。

sentences.english: Tea is one of the greatest cultural treasures of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 茶是中华文明最宝贵的文化财富之一。

sentences.english: Cut open tea bags and stir into the dough until well-combined.
sentences.chinese: 将茶包剪开后倒入，慢速搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Lu Ding tea, medicinal value and nutrients from the benefit of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 路丁茶从药用价值与营养元素上造福人类。

sentences.english: Other brands have inactive forms of theanine that block the effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 其他牌子的没有作用的茶还阻碍了这一效力。

sentences.english: This study is on wood anatomy of 14 species of Camellia sect Chrysan-tha from Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 本文对采自广西的14种金花茶木材进行解剖研究。

sentences.english: I mix it with hot water like tea.
sentences.chinese: 用热水冲泡，喝起来像茶。

sentences.english: Tea and coffee leave stains on cups and in pots.
sentences.chinese: 茶和咖啡会在杯和壶内留下污渍。

sentences.english: Truly, the pure fragrance of tea came out from the tradition of "no sugar".
sentences.chinese: 真的，中国茶的清香和甘甜，全在这不放糖的传统里。

sentences.english: It is usually served with rice or with noodles.
sentences.chinese: 肉骨茶通常用来搭配米饭或面条。

definition: Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu
dark tea, a variety of fermented tea (e.g. Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2])
(fig.) to have a meeting with state security agents (to be warned to behave "responsibly")
Pu'er prefecture level city in Yunnan/county capital of Ning'er Hani and Yi autonomous county 寧洱哈尼族彞族自治縣|宁洱哈尼族彝族自治县
to have tea and refreshments/to have dimsum lunch (Cantonese)
tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
